definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类

sentences.english: This giant 1)reptile isn"t going to show up in Taiwan"s rivers.
sentences.chinese: 这只巨大的爬虫类不会出现在台湾的河流里。

sentences.english: "We have this very simplistic view of reptiles," said Shine.
sentences.chinese: 我们对爬虫类动物的认识太过简单化了。

sentences.english: They classed this insect under the Coleoptera.
sentences.chinese: 他们把这种虫列入甲虫类。

sentences.english: "We have this very simplistic view of reptiles, " said Shine.
sentences.chinese: 我们对爬虫类动物的认识太过简单化了。

sentences.english: Just as all humans are not bad, it is the same with the reptilians .
sentences.chinese: 就像所有的人类都不坏，它是与爬虫类动物类似。

sentences.english: They are insectivores and live in the rain forests of central Africa.
sentences.chinese: 它们是食虫类动物，生活在非洲中部的雨林里。

sentences.english: Mammals arose from a fairly primitive reptile in the Mesozoic era.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳类起源于中生代宛若原始的爬虫类。

sentences.english: Lately, however, another bug has caught America's attention.
sentences.chinese: 然而，最近，另一种虫类引起了美国人的注意。

definition: insect or insect-like small creature (literary)/base person (used as a curse word)
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
